name: The Sleeping Beauty
description:
Short visual novel game made in renpy  for my final project of my 3rd year university

Our game is now Only a Prolouge so it might be shot experience but we hope you enjoy Our game.

Now available in Thai language

Warning :  Flashing lights , Slight Horror , jumpscare 

If you like our game.pls follow us on Twitter Little Duck (@LittleDuckStudi) / Twitter
